verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD אוֹרִ֣י <WH216> [is] my light וְ֭יִשְׁעִי <WH3468> and my salvation מִמִּ֣י <WH4310> Whom אִירָ֑א <WH3372> whom shall I fear יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> ? the LORD מָֽעוֹז־ <WH4581> [is] the strength חַ֝יַּ֗י <WH2416> of my life מִמִּ֥י <WH4310> Whom אֶפְחָֽד׃ <WH6342> of whom shall I be afraid

בִּקְרֹ֤ב <WH7126> came עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> When מְרֵעִים֮ <WH7489> When the wicked לֶאֱכֹ֪ל <WH398> upon me to eat up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂ֫רִ֥י <WH1320> my flesh צָרַ֣י <WH6862> [even] mine enemies וְאֹיְבַ֣י <WH341> and my foes לִ֑י הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they כָשְׁל֣וּ <WH3782> they stumbled וְנָפָֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> and fell

אִם־ <WH518> Though תַּחֲנֶ֬ה <WH2583> should encamp עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> against מַחֲנֶה֮ <WH4264> Though an host לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יִירָ֪א <WH3372> shall not fear לִ֫בִּ֥י <WH3820> against me my heart אִם־ <WH518> Though תָּק֣וּם <WH6965> should rise עָ֭לַי <WH5921> against מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> though war בְּ֝זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I בוֹטֵֽחַ׃ <WH982> against me in this [will] I [be] confident

אַחַ֤ת ׀ <WH259> One שָׁאַ֣לְתִּי <WH7592> [thing] have I desired מֵֽאֵת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD אוֹתָ֪הּ <WH853> אֲבַ֫קֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> that will I seek שִׁבְתִּ֣י <WH3427> after that I may dwell בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days חַיַּ֑י <WH2416> of my life לַחֲז֥וֹת <WH2372> to behold בְּנֹֽעַם־ <WH5278> the beauty יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּלְבַקֵּ֥ר <WH1239> and to enquire בְּהֵיכָלֽוֹ׃ <WH1964> in his temple

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יִצְפְּנֵ֨נִי ׀ <WH6845> he shall hide בְּסֻכֹּה֮ <WH5520> me in his pavilion בְּי֪וֹם <WH3117> For in the time רָ֫עָ֥ה <WH7451> of trouble יַ֭סְתִּרֵנִי <WH5641> shall he hide בְּסֵ֣תֶר <WH5643> in the secret אָהֳל֑וֹ <WH168> of his tabernacle בְּ֝צ֗וּר <WH6697> upon a rock יְרוֹמְמֵֽנִי׃ <WH7311> me he shall set me up

וְעַתָּ֨ה <WH6258> and now יָר֪וּם <WH7311> be lifted up רֹאשִׁ֡י <WH7218> And now shall mine head עַ֤ל <WH5921> above אֹֽיְבַ֬י <WH341> above mine enemies סְֽבִיבוֹתַ֗י <WH5439> round about וְאֶזְבְּחָ֣ה <WH2076> me therefore will I offer בְ֭אָהֳלוֹ <WH168> in his tabernacle זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> sacrifices תְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> of joy אָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> I will sing וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> yea I will sing praises לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD
שְׁמַע־ <WH8085> Hear יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD קוֹלִ֥י <WH6963> with my voice אֶקְרָ֗א <WH7121> [when] I cry וְחָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> have mercy וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> also upon me and answer

לְךָ֤ ׀ אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> my heart בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> [When thou saidst] Seek פָנָ֑י <WH6440> ye my face אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> unto thee Thy face יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> LORD אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> will I seek

אַל־ <WH408> nor תַּסְתֵּ֬ר <WH5641> Hide פָּנֶ֨יךָ ׀ <WH6440> not thy face מִמֶּנִּי֮ <WH4480> at אַֽל־ <WH408> nor תַּט־ <WH5186> away בְּאַ֗ף <WH639> in anger עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ <WH5650> not thy servant עֶזְרָתִ֥י <WH5833> thou hast been my help הָיִ֑יתָ <WH1961> have been אַֽל־ <WH408> nor תִּטְּשֵׁ֥נִי <WH5203> leave וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תַּֽ֝עַזְבֵ֗נִי <WH5800> me not neither forsake אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> me O God יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <WH3468> of my salvation
כִּי־ <WH3588> For אָבִ֣י <WH1> When my father וְאִמִּ֣י <WH517> and my mother עֲזָב֑וּנִי <WH5800> forsake וַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> me then the LORD יַֽאַסְפֵֽנִי׃ <WH622> will take me up

ה֤וֹרֵ֥נִי <WH3384> Teach יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD דַּ֫רְכֶּ֥ךָ <WH1870> me thy way וּ֭נְחֵנִי <WH5148> and lead בְּאֹ֣רַח <WH734> path מִישׁ֑וֹר <WH4334> me in a plain לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> Because שׁוֹרְרָֽי׃ <WH8324> because of mine enemies

אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּ֭תְּנֵנִי <WH5414> Deliver בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> me not over unto the will צָרָ֑י <WH6862> of mine enemies כִּ֥י <WH3588> for קָֽמוּ־ <WH6965> are risen up בִ֥י עֵֽדֵי־ <WH5707> witnesses שֶׁ֝֗קֶר <WH8267> for false וִיפֵ֥חַ <WH3307> against me and such as breathe out חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> cruelty

לׅׄוּלֵׅ֗ׄאׅׄ <WH3884> [I had fainted] unless הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי <WH539> I had believed לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> to see בְּֽטוּב־ <WH2898> the goodness יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

קַוֵּ֗ה <WH6960> Wait אֶל־ <WH413> for יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> on the LORD חֲ֭זַק <WH2388> be of good courage וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ <WH553> and he shall strengthen לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> thine heart וְ֝קַוֵּ֗ה <WH6960> wait אֶל־ <WH413> for יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> I say on the LORD
